Uses of Class
com.novartis.opensource.yada.YADAConnectionException

  • Packages that use YADAConnectionException 
    Package Description
    com.novartis.opensource.yada  
    com.novartis.opensource.yada.util  

    • Uses of YADAConnectionException in com.novartis.opensource.yada

      Methods in com.novartis.opensource.yada that throw YADAConnectionException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private String Service._execute()
      Internal request processor for "get" or "update" requests (i.e., non-uploads.)
      void QueryManager.commit()
      Executes a commit on all connections created during processing of the current request.
      void QueryManager.commit(YADAQuery yq)
      Executes a query-level commit on the connection stored in the YADAQuery referenced by the parameter.
      (package private) YADAQuery[] QueryManager.endowQueries(JSONParams jSONParams)
      Populates the data and parameter storage in the query object, using values passed in request object
      (package private) YADAQuery QueryManager.endowQuery(String q)
      Populates the data and parameter storage in the query object, using values passed in request object.
      static Connection ConnectionFactory.getConnection(String source)
      Returns a JDBC connection from the datasource identified by source.
      YADAQuery Finder.getQuery(String q)
      Overloaded version of Finder.getQuery(String, boolean) always passing true in the second updateStats arg.
      YADAQuery Finder.getQuery(String q, boolean updateStats)
      A cornerstone to the entire YADA framework, this method takes the name of a stored query as an argument and returns a YADAQuery object containing the query code and default parameters, as well as data structures and methods to facilitate it's execution.
      YADAQuery Finder.getQueryFromIndex(String q)
      Retrieves the query q from the distributed index (i.e., database).
      static SOAPConnection ConnectionFactory.getSOAPConnection()
      Creates a generic SOAP connection object to use for communication with an endpoint.
      private void QueryManager.prepQueriesForExecution() 
      private void QueryManager.processQueries()
      A broker method which calls QueryManager.endowQuery(String) (for standard param requests) or QueryManager.endowQueries(JSONParams) for json params requests, followed by QueryManager.prepQueriesForExecution() in succession
      void QueryManager.releaseResources()
      This method attempts (and usually suceeds) to close all JDBC resources opened during processing of the current request, including ResultSets PreparedStatements and CallableStatements using the utility methods in ConnectionFactory
      static void ConnectionFactory.releaseResources(Connection conn)
      Returns the Connection, specified by the parameter, to the connection pool.
      static void ConnectionFactory.releaseResources(ResultSet rs)
      Retrieves the Statement from the ResultSet, closes the ResultSet, and then cascades to close the Statement (which in turn will cascade to close its Connection).
      static void ConnectionFactory.releaseResources(SOAPConnection conn, String source)
      Closes the SOAPConnection
      static void ConnectionFactory.releaseResources(Statement stmt)
      Retrieves the Connection from the Statement parameter, closes the Statement and then cascades to close the Connection.
      void YADAQuery.setConnection() 
      void YADAQuery.setConnection(String source)
      Set a transactional connection for the source
      void YADAQuery.setConnection(String source, boolean transactions)
      Set a transactional or non-transactional connection for the source
      private void QueryManager.storeConnection(YADAQuery yq)
      Adds the JDBC or SOAP connection object for yq to the internal index.
      private void QueryManager.storePreparedStatement(YADAQuery yq, String code)
      Adds the JDBC statement to the internal index
      private void QueryManager.storePreparedStatementForCount(YADAQuery yq, PreparedStatement p, String code)
      Adds the JDBC statement to the internal index
      (package private) void Finder.updateQueryStatistics(String qname)
      A utility method called in a separate thread by Finder.getQuery(String) to increment a query-access counter in the YADA Index.
      Constructors in com.novartis.opensource.yada that throw YADAConnectionException 
      Constructor and Description
      QueryManager(YADARequest yadaReq)
      Constructor stores config object and JSONParams if necessary, then calls effectively bootstraps query management process by calling QueryManager.processQueries()
